General.Name: Advanced Analog Technology
General.Description: Advanced Analog Technology, Inc. designs, researches, and develops analog ICs in Taiwan. It provides multifunctional PMICs, such as TFT LCDs, AMOLEDs, DSC/DVs, and portable devices; boost, buck, buck-boost, and inverting switching regulators; WLED drivers consisting of backlights and lighting products; and battery management products comprising battery chargers and battery protection products. The company also offers audio amps, GPMs, LDOs, level shifters, and BLDC motor driver products. Its products are used in DSC/DV/drive recorder, PND, and discrete and integrated LCD panel applications. Advanced Analog Technology, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.
